website_summaries.verdict: Many women who ordinarily don't wear heels ordered these for special occasions and wore them straight out of the box. All night. A classic, enduring look.
pros: Sandals come in a variety of colors with suede, leather, and man-made uppers
Halo strap with adjustable buckle closure
Lightly padded footbed, wrapped stem heel, and synthetic sole
cons: Some find the straps to be too tight

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and the perfect nude strappy dress sandal - wore them all night. Looked great in pics!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole McGee

customer_reviews.title: If you tend to fluctuate between sizes order your smaller size (and maybe in a wide)
customer_reviews.text: I love a minimalist heel! Ive been looking at these and other designers like this for months. I finally purchased (size:10). I am a 9.5 to 10. In heels typically I buy more 10s... So thats what I bought here. Bad choice! As these I feel run a bit on the longer side. I have a thin foot so width was not an issue. They just flopped around a little more than I would like- So off they go- I will exchange them for a 9.5W (only because the strap will now be crossing more of the ball of my foot instead of the toes. They are a BEAUTIFUL SHOE! Can't wait to get them in the right fit!!
customer_reviews.author: Lace1010

customer_reviews.title: ouch!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these and wanted to get them for so long. When I finally got them this past winter I was super excited. I put them on one spring morning and went to the office and had to take them off 2 hours later. I have a desk job so I sit most of the time shoes never bother me. These shoes hurt so bad when I got up to use the restroom the second time, I got a blister on the back of my ankle and could tell one was starting on one of my toes. Wish I didn't wait so long to were them because now I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: KTurn

customer_reviews.title: Hurt feet like CRAZY
customer_reviews.text: The straps across the toes were incredibly tight. Especially my left foot. It hurt so badly all day. When I finally got a chance to take the shoe off, my pinky toe on that foot was swollen, purple, and throbbing for about 30 minutes. I have another pair, different color where the straps are fine. Another pair I have the straps are way too tight and I was only able to wear once ;( they ARE cute though and have perfct heel height
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely HATE wearing heels
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely HATE wearing heels. I've never been good at walking in heels and I usually carry a pair of flats with me whenever I go out. After wearing these at graduation, however, I didn't even need to change out of them. They're so comfortable and easy to walk in. Highly recommend these shoes - they go with almost every outfit too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: #Comfortableandsexy
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes I've purchase in a long time. I love this style and have some from different brands but those always took a while to be broken in. I have a narrow foot but sensitive toes (corns) and these don't put pressure on my toes. These by far are the most comfortable, where right out of the box, shoes EVER!!!! I'm so happy with this purchase I'm looking into getting other colors. They are super cute, true to fit/size, and if you love this simple style you will not be disappointed. Very sexy!
customer_reviews.author: LMU

customer_reviews.title: I HATE wearing heels
customer_reviews.text: I HATE wearing heels, but Sam Edelman makes it possible! I literally wont buy any other heel and with as much as heels CAN cost, these are affordable and durable. The color of these are a bit more on the blush side rather than nude, but that doesn't bother me at all. All SE shoes fit as expected which makes it easy. I am a size 6 in most everything and so there is never a need to check a sizing chart etc. Cannot go wrong with Sam Edelman!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: perfect wedding shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect shoes for a formal wedding. The color is lovely and they're so slim and elegant, which means they'll go great with a variety of things. Almost all shoes hurt my feet and I'm usually out of them as soon as we hit the dance floor, but I kept these on all night and only started to experience achy feet several hours in. The heel was high enough to be flattering to my calves but not so high that I was wobbling around. I want these in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I have bad feet but don't want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I have bad feet but don't want to sacrifice style for comfort. These are great! I get the look and feel of the simple heel that is in style right now but don't have the excruciating pain from a 4 inch heel. Wore these to a wedding all night and no pain and lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: KAY83

customer_reviews.title: Ankle strap issue
customer_reviews.text: These are the best heels you will ever purchase. Perfect height. Great leather. Looks great with everything. The wide width was perfect for my foot. Only problem I had is with the ankle strap. One of my feet swells due to multiple broken bones over time, and the ankle strap was almost impossible to get closed around that ankle. Still and all I think these SE shoes are wonderful and worth every penny. I wish they would make more of the colors available in the wide width, because I would happily buy more if these shoes in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: All_S@ints

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend buying these
customer_reviews.text: I received these shoes hours before I had to leave for a wedding so I was nervous wearing them all night. However, for a person who never wears heels and when I do I take them off as soon as I can, I wore these ALL NIGHT! I even was dancing in my shoes, it was after a long day/night of wearing the shoes that my feet were hurting. I highly recommend buying these! The only issue I had was my pinky toe was a little squished but I assume after I break them in it will be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Diana F Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I think I bought them a smidge too big I am keeping them lol. I love them. I Hate heels honestly because I hate my feet hurting so I barely wear them...but these. Went to a surprise party wore them the whole night and danced in them. Never in life has that happened lol. They are an investment tho. Next pair will a Christmas present to myself!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Heeled Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Like most of her high heels, I ordered the wide in these. Fit was good. They were just very slightly about a quarter size larger but was doable with the ankle strap to keep her heels in place. It also allowed her to put a heel cushion/padding to make the already comfortable heeled sandal even more comfortable. She got these in the black leather as well. Happy comfortable feet is a happy wife! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jon-Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: I love Sam Edelman shoes. Unfortunately this time they didn't work for me. The strap across the toes was too tight. I barely made it out the front door and down the drive way before I had to turn around and take them off. They were so uncomfortable that I had to take them off and wear another pair of shoes. I have been a size 5 or 5.5 for most of my life and the sizing on this shoe was definitely off. To wear these comfortably I would have had to have a really narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable! I bought one size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 in flats and I tried similar style shoes on in the mall and had to go down one size, so I ordered these in a full size smaller and they fit perfectly. So to me, they fit as expected but if I had ordered my typical size, they would have been too big. The shoes were extremely comfortable. I wore them all night and I rarely wear heels. Nice height. Easy to walk in. I didnt not find the tow area to be too large or pointy as other reviews mentioned. I found the shoes to be perfect. Great dark cranberry color.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heels. Stop looking. Buy these now.
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I had to for these shoes. I purchased the Evening Sand Patent Heels. They are gorgeous. high quality heels, that are a true nude for medium skintones. I wore them right out of the box and walked all around the city, enjoyed dinner then danced until 3 am. They held up beautifully and were comfortable and stable. They are true to size ( I ordered size 10) and the ankle strap has plenty of holes to make the shoes tighter for those with slender ankles. This style of sandal has been really popular this season, I highly recommend buying these without question. Wish they had more colors available in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Serenbe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Heel Height
customer_reviews.text: Not too high, not too short. These are easy to walk in and the perfect date night shoe. I'm so happy I purchased them. They serve their purpose and look sexy too. Also the ankle strap actually has enough holes for a change! I have small ankles for a size 9 and normally have to take my shoes to a cobbler to have additional holes added so I can make the ankle strap tight enough. These have a lot of holes so you have plenty of room for adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Mink

customer_reviews.title: these are beautiful shoes. I will wear them with a pad ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are beautiful shoes. I will wear them with a pad in the ball of the foot but they are otherwise comfortable. The 3" heel is easy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: pickyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Leopard Lover
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much very comfy and fits true to size
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Fab.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Lovely and feminine, not so tall that you might die... I adore them. I will order more, as they are WAY more comfy than it seemed possible. Wore them for 7 hours straight to a dance and after party. The only tough time was when we were standing around after such a long night of dancing. We all know that’s the worst part for any heels anyway. I would love to give them six stars.... Or ten!
customer_reviews.author: Linnea Woolridge

customer_reviews.title: Shoes great but misadvertised. SHOE METRO NOT!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes great but seller isn't. Shoes looked worn. They still work and I will keep only because they were 50% off the retail price. For as much as I will wear them I'll deal with the bottoms being smudged up.
customer_reviews.author: JETLAND

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised at how comfortable I was all night wearing these for the first time. So glad I spent the extra money and got these higher quality shoes. I figured the style is always uncomfortable, but I was comfortable. Walked on gravel, in grass, danced on the dance floor and they look great. The shoes feel and look quality, you can tell when you take them out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sandals
customer_reviews.text: these I ordered in 9 1/2W and fit perfectly. band does not hurt my toes and width is perfect for wide feet. Heel is 3" and easy for all day wearing. Best fitting sandals that I have purchased. Usually have to order size 10 b and end up a little long ...these in 9 1/2W are perfect for my size feet. I have 3 pairs now.
customer_reviews.author: g d y

customer_reviews.title: Just my take on it yours may be better
customer_reviews.text: I tried them in. And, The shoes seemed slippery as I walked, my ties were sliding. This, heel wasn't high enough for the outfit I choose to wear. And I wasn't to comfortable with the strap around my ankle. It wasn't secure enough which, resulted in my feet sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Jerria

customer_reviews.title: Dainty, horrid color “nude” is greyish
customer_reviews.text: The nude beige looked like a sickly grey beige against my skin. Horrible color, only recommend for ladies with darker skin tones looking for contrast. Yuck. Fit of 6.5 w may be slightly tight, I’d try the 7w if I order again but it was doable for my wider across the middle feet. Style extremely dainty, so I personally may go for the slightly thicker strap style from Sam Edelman.
customer_reviews.author: MarquessaX ^_^

customer_reviews.title: Lovely neutral sandal/heel, runs large.
customer_reviews.text: For once, this shoe was too wide for me. The toe strap is too high for me. I needed a more substantial shoe anyway it seems, couldn't make this feel stable. I know other women who would love them, but I would recommend a 1/2 size smaller or more if you have very thin feet. Beautiful leather, and nice neutral color.
customer_reviews.author: JulieToodles0001

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable AND Stylish
customer_reviews.text: BEST HEELS EVER! Classic style that you can wear for years to come. I HATE heels, I usually wear uniform boots while at work, and flip flops when I am not. I have never had a pair of heels that I could comfortably walk in and dance in ALL night until these. I bought the nude pair which is light pink, I would love to see these in a cognac leather color, or more of a brown leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are very pretty and comfortable. They are not too tight across the toes and I was able to wear them to a wedding all night with out pain. I wear a nine and that is what I bought in these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia

customer_reviews.title: I like them very much
customer_reviews.text: After reading feedback from others, I was prepared for the toe strap to be a bit tight. I have a narrow foot so the fit is snug across the toe but tolerable. I imagine it will stretch a bit once worn a few times. The shoe itself is well made and attractive in a classy minimalist way. Very versatile-you can dress these up or down. I like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: JMc

customer_reviews.title: Sexy & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great. The band in the front cover the base of my toes making my long toes not look so long. It keeps my toes together and not slipping off sides or front of shoe. The shoes are a comfortable height too. I'll need to wear them for a four hour event, so I didn't want the heels to be too high.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for the lower heel which is not too old lady like but actually looks good. I received them put them on the same day and wore them for over 7 hours. Not one problem. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of heels I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in Love! I have never been able to wear a pair of heels this high for more than a few hours. These shoes are the bomb! Not only are they great looking, they are comfortable, easy to walk in, the width is slightly more narrow than other 10.5's I have tried and owned. But that works for me! Great pair of shoes and now my favorite, ever!
customer_reviews.author: Ferns and Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 10M and it was slightly large. I would buy the 9.5M but the price difference is significant. The shoes I got appeared to be used or at least a "try on model" so I'm returning it and buying another one. Looks very sexy on! I imagine these will look great with just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Manders78

customer_reviews.title: Order wide, but 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: The width is great- order wide, but order a half size smaller. For some reason the toe of the shoe is too long. I had to return. Also, heel seemed kind of short to me, I measured and it was correct. But just “looked” short. Good quality and fast delivery. But take my advice and order a wide, but 1/2 smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.author: JBCMom

customer_reviews.title: These Sam Edelman Patti sandals are the perfect height and look amazing
customer_reviews.text: I work in an office and have always worn heels. But as I'm getting older I find that I can't wear the high heels that I used to. These Sam Edelman Patti sandals are the perfect height and look amazing!! I have these in three colours. Super comfortable, always get compliments when I wear them and recommend for office wear as well as parties etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wider than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet, size 7.5, sometimes 8, especially with narrower heels, so I bought the 7.5W and they are both long and loose. They fit a little bit better with inserts, but I should have gone with 7W.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND comfortable! I now own 5 colors.
customer_reviews.text: There is nooooothing I dislike about this shoe. In fact, I now own 5 pairs (5 different colors). They stay on my feet, aren't too high or too low, and are so cute. They dress up jeans and are perfect for work. My favorite color is the Cork.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: The heel is just long enough for a sexy look but short enough to last all night with them. They are very comfortable. I got the wide and they fit great. I will be buying more colors for sure.
customer_reviews.author: grramirez

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love Sam Edelman shoes, and the Patti is one of my favorite styles. They’re very comfortable and go with everything from jeans to dresses. This is my 3rd pair. Seller’s is great and received quicker than expected.
customer_reviews.author: callisun2000

customer_reviews.title: walkable heels
customer_reviews.text: I had these in another color for my weeding, and I lasted the entire day in these sandals; I normally live in flats/Birkenstocks. I find that they run a little long. I usually wear a 7.5-8, but I take a 7 in these. The wide is very wide...I thought I had wide feet, but the toe strap on the wide version was too loose to hold my foot securely. Also, the nude color of the wide shoe was a little different and less faltering on me than the medium width. Shipping on these shoes was very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Randell Cox

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in shoe condition
customer_reviews.text: These shoes appear to have been worn prior to receipt. The heel is damaged and the bottoms are dirty and clearly worn. Very unfortunate that I had no choice but to wear them as I could not find my size in these anywhere else in time for the event I needed them for. I will say they are one of the most comfortable pairs of heels I’ve ever owned and as someone that typically cannot walk in heels, I looked completely natural in these. I’m currently looking elsewhere to buy a pair to replace these. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful shoes. They are not ones that you could wear for a really long time if you have to stand for longer than an hour. But they are well made and cute on.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonandBlue

customer_reviews.title: I wore them comfortably for a few hours
customer_reviews.text: The strap on the front was narrow. I have average feet. I wore them comfortably for a few hours. Also, the strap stretched a little. They are soft leather so that will happen. I really didn't notice any discomfort. I walked around too for about an hour so it was okay. I would recommend them because they look so sexy.
customer_reviews.author: CharmedOne

customer_reviews.title: Quality as always
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Sam Edelman as they make stylish wide size shoes which are hard to come by. I would have given 5 stars but was disappointed in the height of the heel and so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: MMF

customer_reviews.title: But it seems like this issue only applies to the wide sizes
customer_reviews.text: Order half a size down! I didnt listened to the other reviews when i should have! I ordered a size 7W (my normal size) and it was a little big! But it seems like this issue only applies to the wide sizes. Size 6.5W would have been perfect. Only wore it for an hour and my feet was already starting to hurt! Not comfortable at all!!
customer_reviews.author: RonStoppable

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are sexy and comfortable! They seem to run small. I normally wear either a 8.5 or 9. I needed a 9.5 in these and I’ve never owned a 9.5. They are narrow but that’s a good thing for my narrow feet. The length ran small. I’d buy these again and in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Boujee Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size down 1/2 a size....comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These heels are very comfortable. Highly recommend if you're not use to wearing heels. Got these to wear for a wedding and I did not complain all night about my heels. I usually wear 6 1/2-7 in shoes and got these in a 6 1/2 and fit me perfect so I will say to size down 1/2 a size. You will not regret this purchase
customer_reviews.author: IlyWag

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Fits good. Nice color, but i had to glue back part of the padding in shoes after wearing, this brand is usually very good, must have been an oversight
customer_reviews.author: april ray

customer_reviews.title: All over fit issues.
customer_reviews.text: Fit really weird. ordered a 7W, which is usually a perfect fit for me I when I can find it. When my foot was all the way forward, the heel part didn't fit, and vise versa. Didn't have time to order a different size. Wish it would have worked because I love the styling.
customer_reviews.author: YarnDoctor

customer_reviews.title: Sandals fit great - love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Love Color and most of all the heel size. Most lovely looking shoes these days are oftentimes 4" and above and a bit too high for me to wear at Age 65.
customer_reviews.author: veronica ricketts

customer_reviews.title: Foundation of a classic wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the nude color and they go well with everything. They are light weight and comfortable. I wore them at a wedding and was running around caring for my extremely energetic and active toddler for 5 hours + and in all honestly didn’t feel pain in any way. The ankle straps are thin and do not overpower the ankle area .These shoes are a must have and the foundation of a classic wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Gerbil

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoe - beware ankle strap
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe. I appreciate that it comes in wide width. However, the ankle strap doesn't seem to have been made any longer to accommodate wider with ankles. It was pretty tough to get on and I don't think that my ankles are particularly large.
customer_reviews.author: sandalgirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and looks pretty too!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I’m usually a 7.5 in San Edelman flats, but in the heels the 7 fits better. In most shoes I’m a 7 so I think these are true to size. They seem comfortable and the heel is a good height, not to high. The nude color isn’t to peachy or too taupe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are GORGEOUS. So elegant looking and decently comfortable considering they are heels with straps. They really accent your ankles and are easy to walk in. I want another pair in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Love me some Sam Edelman!
customer_reviews.text: Love Sam Edelman shoes!! These “Patti” heels are lovely and are as comfortable as you can get in heeled sandals!! They are so versatile, and pair perfectly with almost anything that I wear to the office!
customer_reviews.author: CrFerrant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was in search for shoes for my rehearsal dinner. When the shoes arrived and I tried them on, everything came together! I'm very satisfied with my purchase and I can wear the shoes with other outfits too!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for this style of shoe...don’t look further. Not too high. Style that won’t hurt your feet to walk
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, classy strappy sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! I needed a shoe with a smaller heel than the 4 inch ones I was wearing, and these fit the bill perfectly. They are so classy, and bonus is that they are comfortable as well. I'm a pretty solid 8.5 in everything, and these shoes fit me perfectly. I am planning to buy them in black so that I will have them in the nude color and black.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Kitten heel
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn them more for a few minutes, but they fit the bill so far. don't pinch my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Mia V.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I love Sam Edelman, and love Amazon for carrying such a large assortment of shoes for my daughter, in a women's size 10.5! We ordered 4 pairs of shoes this day, with the hopes of keeping one, and kept three pair. Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 7 heels, but true to form Sam Elderman usually runs a half size larger so the 6.5 fit my slim feet perfectly. The leather is soft and comfortable...worth every dollar spent.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!
customer_reviews.text: These heels fit great. Typically, ankle shoes can be a bit large on my foot because of the openness of the toe, however these fit excellently. They provide arch support and almost feel like a 2.5" heel so they are plenty comfortable to wear for longer periods of time. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a quality nude heel.
customer_reviews.author: Mleedpitt

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but the back is very tall and painfully ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but the back is very tall and painfully rubs the Achilles‘ tendon, making these only suitable for sitting.
customer_reviews.author: kjwhitley

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes; go with everything
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes; go with everything, and the heel isn't crazy high. Was so happy to be able to find a nice shoe in a small size (4.5)!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I’m taking them on vacation next month, they are comfortable and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Got scratched up and damages after 1 wear to a desk job. Not like my other Sam Edelman shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and comfortable, I can wear all day and on my feet dancing. Would love to own one in every color.
customer_reviews.author: E. FONDUFE

customer_reviews.title: Too tight of a strap
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised these shoes got such great reviews. The strap across the feet was way too tight and I do not have wide feet. They are not comfortable on my feet. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Buy them. Do it:
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I believed the reviews and ordered these shoes. Everyone was saying these were comfortable but I have never been able to find this style of shoe that's even close to comfortable. These are the exception! I wore them to a wedding reception and stood and danced the majority of the night and my feet never hurt. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Wide but it was extremely large and fit more like a 7 -7
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size 6.5 and have wide feet, so I ordered the 6.5 Wide but it was extremely large and fit more like a 7 -7.5, so I sent it back and ordered a 6 wide. It fit perfect, so you might have to order a half size down for the wide sizes. Other than that, they are very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not even close to the standard of other shoes I've bought from Sam Edelman
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed by the quality- not even close to the standard of other shoes I've bought from Sam Edelman - the leather had patches of brown staining and scuffing to it, for some reason they didn't come with a shoe box. Unfortunately I ordered these next day delivery because of needing them for an occasion and had little choice but to wear them, otherwise I would have returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and glad I got wide
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. Really glad I got the wide as my feet tend to be a bit wide and it helps in the toe area. I wish the ankle strap was a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar H. Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Sexy And Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Theses goes are sexy and comfortable. Sam Eddleman shoes are very well made and worth double what I paid for these. I love the lower heel and the fun color which I can wear with jeans for a date or with a nice skirt for work.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. This is my first time buying this brand. The shoe is simple, sexy yet classy. Fits true to size. Its not high so easy to walk in. I would definitely buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperNita

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, stylish shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit, feel, and style. I can wear these all day at work. I both stand and sit and walk during the day.
customer_reviews.author: sailorwagner83

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: For being a more narrow heel it fits surprisingly more comfortable than I would have guessed. Very femanine.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I never wear heels and was skeptic on if these would be shoes I could wear for graduation. They ended up being extremely comfy and easy to walk in! As for sizing I am always either a 8.5 or a 9. If you go inbetween sizes like me go the size down! The 8.5 fit perfectly even with a little room and the 9 would of been to big.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn grubczak

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful. I am pretty tall so I don't like ...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. I am pretty tall so I don't like wearing very high heels, but these are the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Annalisa Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Dress up or dress down these are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the gate. No need for breaking in. The ankle strap makes the legs look longer and the heel height is just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I would have 5 stars except that the Colourist was not what I expected. I ordered "soft nude" and what I got was a light peachy shade which was not my perception of "nude". Other than that it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I never wear heels and I bought these for an event. they are the most comfortable heels I have ever worn. I worse them for about 5 hours and did not feel any pain
customer_reviews.author: lacy palomino

customer_reviews.title: Nice- would buy a wife next time.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. I bought these for a wedding. I have normal width feet, but I would have liked to try the wide. At the end of the wedding the only thing that hurt was the front strap.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan179

customer_reviews.title: You may need to consider a wide. Length is true to size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had to buy a wide but the regular width looked & felt too narrow
customer_reviews.author: C. Pisut

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the widths
customer_reviews.text: I chose a wide because the M were too narrow. The wide are very wide and my foot is not secure like I want.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Lee Dawdy

customer_reviews.title: Great heel for any outfit!
customer_reviews.text: Love these heels. Perfect to match ANY outfit! Buy them. Perfect sized heel. Wore them all night during a wedding as a guest.
customer_reviews.author: TMF

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this shoe! In fact, I love these shoes so much that I’ve purchased this fit in three different colors. These shoes don’t only look super sexy and good, but fit me super comfortably... even while being pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Tovar

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, comfortable... and really beautiful gold detail at the back. I want ALL of them!
customer_reviews.author: Michi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good height. I'm 5'10", 44 years old, and anything over 3" is too high for my style. This stiletto is perfect for a corporate work environment. Very professional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fits good but...
customer_reviews.text: The tips of the heels didn't last long...got only a single wear... but they are, or I should say, they WERE beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are well put together. The height of the heel was perfect for me, at 5'8".
customer_reviews.author: intermediate user

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on, and love the extra padding on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on, and love the extra padding on the sole. The heel felt a little flimsy though, not a lot of ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Krier

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable heels I own. All heels hurt me, but these I can wear all day and no pain!
customer_reviews.author: bmw

customer_reviews.title: It is not high yet it is not low just perfect. It fits great and true to size
customer_reviews.text: This is such a classy pair of heels. It is not high yet it is not low just perfect. It fits great and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Omg I loved these. So comfortable I danced in them all night and I am a high heel gal anymore. Buying a second pair in black
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic fit
customer_reviews.text: Classic pair of black sandals. I’m a size 8 and they fit perfectly. The heel height is ideal as well.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Bought exactly the same shoe in a different colour but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought exactly the same shoe in a different colour but somehow in this colour it was miles too small :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect neutral shoe, great heel height
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes! They were comfortable for hours at an outdoor wedding. The height is great, not too low not too high and the style is trendy and timeless at the same time. Very happy with them, I would definitely buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: SDF's Collections

customer_reviews.title: OUCH
customer_reviews.text: These things HURT as soon as I began walking in them. The strap around the ankle scratches as you walk, and the heel is even worse. I can't even imagine wearing these things out. I would have a blister in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Kensey Lawhun

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this shoe in an 81/2US. It was a 1/2 size too big. So I returned it and got it in an 8US. It fit perfectly. Can't wait till Spring/Summer in NYC so I can wear it. (Gotta get a pedicure too LOL)
customer_reviews.author: My2Prettyeyes4u

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but fit tight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful, but the band at the top is so tight and does not feel like it will stretch. I’m hoping to find a way to make these work.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoli B.

product_meta.title: Sam Edelman Women's Patti Sandals
product_meta.description:
Sleek heeled sandal with slim ankle and toe straps

Sam Edelman shoes epitomize chic comfort. With exceptional materials and fine styling, each pair of Sam Edelman shoes is an affordable luxury that cleverly combines a youthful outlook with a worldly sensibility. Sophistication with down-to-earth appeal mean that these shoes are made to be lived in. Whether it's a classic revisited for a modern interpretation or a cutting edge design, Sam Edelman shoes always keep an emphasis on comfort. How to Measure Measuring Foot Length To measure your foot length, sit down on a chair and place foot flat on a piece of paper. Trace the foot by holding a pencil vertically and outlining the foot. The longest toe and back of heel are the most important measurements. Using a ruler, measure the distance from the bottom of the heel to the tip of the longest toe. Record the result in both inches and centimeters and use these measurements to find your size in the chart. If one foot is larger than the other, the measurements for the larger foot should be used. Measuring Heel Height To measure heel height, measure from where the heel meets the sole to the bottom most tip. Flat/Low: < 1” Mid: 1” - 2.5” High: 2.5” - 4” Ultra-High: > 4” Measuring Boot Shaft Height To measure boot shaft height, use a soft measuring tape to measure from the bottom of the foot up the length of the calf. Ankle: 3” - 8” Mid-Calf: 8” - 13.5” Tall/Knee High: 13.5” - 17” Over the Knee: > 17” Measuring Calf Circumference To measure calf circumference, wrap a soft measuring tape around the fullest part of the calf. Standard Calf Circumference: < 16” Extended Wide Calf: > 16”2
feature_bullets: Two-piece pump featuring closed heel cup with slender adjustable ankle strap
